question: Who among the following was the third guru of Sikhs ?
explanation: Guru Amar das ji (1479-1574 AD) was the 3rd Guru of Sikhs and was given the title of Sikh Guru. He is known for introducing the Anand Karaj ( Sikh marriage ceremony), composed Anand Sahib and started Sikh Manji system and Piri System.
